channel.title: CD Drive Help
channel.description: Some one here might be able to help me. My CD drive was not being used so I switched it out for another hard drive, now I am in need of it but cannot get it to reconnect. Thanks for your time.

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: rockmartinn24
item.description:
I think it is not a big problem. You can check the jumpers of your hard drive. You can also check it your CD drive in another system. You can also contact your hardware engineer.

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: JollyGiant13
item.description:
sersoft:

problem detected: bad IDE cable go get a new one

Figures thanks, I’ll give that a try.

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help

item.description:
problem detected: bad IDE cable go get a new one

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: JollyGiant13
item.description:
sersoft:

put both on cable select and put the CD drive at the end of the cable

It detects the CD drive but not the hard drive and then it won’t boot.

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
put both on cable select and put the CD drive at the end of the cable

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: JollyGiant13
item.description:
russilker:

check the jumpers on the drives to make sure there arent two conflicting master hard drives or master disc drives, and make sure the hard drives are on one ide cable and the cd drives on another

I believe the jumpers are correctly set, a single drive set to master, and the hard drive is on another cable as well.

And I don’t think I did felipedomaul.

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
check the jumpers on the drives to make sure there arent two conflicting master hard drives or master disc drives, and make sure the hard drives are on one ide cable and the cd drives on another

Read full topic

item.title: CD Drive Help
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
i guess you switched to a ide hard drive,so you might have screwed up while reconecting the cables.
